CreateTDidByHost.document: TDID平台自动生成公私钥对托管在DID平台，并注册DID
CreateTDidByHost.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTDidByHost
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DAPId": 1,
    "CustomAttribute": "{\"a\":{\"c\":1},\"b\":\"test\"}"
}
CreateTDidByHost.title: 自动生成公私钥注册DID

CreateTDidByPubKey.document: 上传用户本地公钥文件创建DID标识
CreateTDidByPubKey.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdid.tencentcloudapi.com

{

}

IssueCredential.document: 凭证颁发方签发可验证凭证
IssueCredential.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: IssueCredential
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DAPId": 37,
    "CRDLArg": {
        "CPTId": 1,
        "Issuer": "did:tdid:w1:0x2e3455523646b1f4ebb40fe0c244bc329eb6fcbc",
        "ExpirationDate": "2023-06-29 15:25:00",
        "ClaimJson": "{\"action\": \"deactiveDid\",\"id\": \"did:tdid:w1:0x2e3455523646b1f4ebb40fe0c244bc329eb6fcbc\",\"deactivated\": \"true\", \"__trans__\": {\"x\": \"a\", \"y\": 1} }"
    }
}
IssueCredential.title: 颁发可验证凭证
